name: Billie´s Dream
description:
CONTROLS:

Jump  =  up arrow  -- w

 Movement  =    left or   A               right   or  D  

Dash = shit + D  or  shit + A         ||   Z + A   or Z + D

Attack  =     Q  or  Space      

Attack 2 =  E;

UI

LIFE =       GREEN BAR

DASH BAR =     BLUE BAR

POWER BAR =   GREEN CIRCLE

NOTE: 
IF YOU CANT SEE ALL THE GAME RESOLUTION, YOU CAN ALWAYS GO FULLSCREENS FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE

THANKS FOR PLAYING :D!!!
